name: House of Dusty Mirrors (for Alison Knowles)
description:
The House of Dust (1967) by Fluxist artist Alison Knowles with fortran programming on a Siemens 4004 computer by James Tenney was one of the first computer generated poems ever created. 

House of Dusty Mirrors.  24 pages.  13.8" x 13.8" pdf. Xerox Sutra Editions.  copyleft 2022.
